name: dish-ai-commit
description: 🤖 由 AI 提供支持的 VSCode 扩展，用于生成标准化的 Git/SVN 提交消息 - 🤖 AI-Powered VSCode extension for generating standardized Git/SVN commit messages. ✨ Supports multiple AI services: OpenAI, ChatGPT, Ollama, Zhipu, DashScope, Doubao, Gemini and VS Code built-in AI. 🌍 Multi-language support (EN/CN/JP/KR/Other). 📊 Auto-generate weekly reports.

commands.title: [Dish] Generate Commit with AI
commands.description: 使用 AI 生成提交信息

commands.title: [Dish] Select AI Model
commands.description: 选择用于生成提交信息的AI模型

commands.title: [Dish] Generate Weekly Report with AI
commands.description: 使用 AI 生成周报

commands.title: [Dish] Review Code with AI
commands.description: 使用 AI 对代码进行评审

commands.title: [Dish] Generate Branch Name with AI
commands.description: 使用 AI 生成Git分支名称

commands.title: [Dish] Generate PR Summary with AI
commands.description: 使用 AI 生成 PR 摘要

commands.title: [Dish] Update Model Info
commands.description: 更新 AI 模型信息

dish-ai-commit.base.language.description: Commit message language / 提交信息语言

dish-ai-commit.providers.openai.apiKey.description: OpenAI API Key / OpenAI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.openai.baseUrl.description: OpenAI API Base URL / OpenAI API 基础地址

dish-ai-commit.providers.zhipu.apiKey.description: Zhipu AI API Key / 智谱 AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.dashscope.apiKe.description: DashScope API Key / 灵积 API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.doubao.apiKey.description: Doubao API Key / 豆包 API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.ollama.baseUrl.description: Ollama API Base URL / Ollama API 基础地址

dish-ai-commit.providers.gemini.apiKey.description: Gemini AI API Key / Gemini AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.baiduQianfan.ap.description: Baidu Qianfan API Key / 百度千帆 API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.baiduQianfan.se.description: Baidu Qianfan Secret Key / 百度千帆 Secret Key

dish-ai-commit.providers.deepseek.apiKey.description: Deepseek AI API Key / Deepseek AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.siliconflow.api.description: SiliconFlow AI API Key / SiliconFlow AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.openrouter.apiK.description: OpenRouter AI API Key / OpenRouter AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.perplexity.apiK.description: Perplexity AI API Key / Perplexity AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.premai.apiKey.description: PremAI API Key / PremAI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.premai.baseUrl.description: PremAI API Base URL / PremAI API 基础地址

dish-ai-commit.providers.together.apiKey.description: Together AI API Key / Together AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.together.baseUr.description: Together AI API Base URL / Together AI API 基础地址

dish-ai-commit.providers.xai.apiKey.description: xAI API Key / xAI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.anthropic.apiKe.description: Anthropic API Key / Anthropic API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.mistral.apiKey.description: Mistral AI API Key / Mistral AI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.azureOpenai.api.description: Azure OpenAI API Key / Azure OpenAI API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.azureOpenai.end.description: Azure OpenAI Endpoint / Azure OpenAI 终结点

dish-ai-commit.providers.azureOpenai.api.description: Azure OpenAI API Version / Azure OpenAI API 版本

dish-ai-commit.providers.azureOpenai.org.description: Azure OpenAI Organization ID / Azure OpenAI 组织 ID

dish-ai-commit.providers.cloudflare.apiK.description: Cloudflare API Key / Cloudflare API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.cloudflare.acco.description: Cloudflare Account ID / Cloudflare 账户 ID

dish-ai-commit.providers.vertexai.projec.description: Vertex AI Project ID / Vertex AI 项目 ID

dish-ai-commit.providers.vertexai.locati.description: Vertex AI Location / Vertex AI 位置

dish-ai-commit.providers.vertexai.apiEnd.description: Optional. The base Vertex AI endpoint to use for the request. / 可选。用于请求的 Vertex AI 端点。

dish-ai-commit.providers.vertexai.google.description: Optional. JSON string of GoogleAuthOptions for authentication. / 可选。用于身份验证的 GoogleAuthOptions 的 JSON 字符串。

dish-ai-commit.providers.groq.apiKey.description: Groq API Key / Groq API 密钥

dish-ai-commit.providers.lmstudio.baseUr.description: LMStudio API Base URL / LMStudio API 基础地址

dish-ai-commit.features.suppressNonCriti.description: Suppress non-critical warning popups, such as context length warnings. / 禁用非关键性警告弹窗，例如上下文长度警告。

dish-ai-commit.features.codeAnalysis.dif.description: Specify the target for git diff: 'staged' for staged changes, 'all' for all changes, 'auto' for automatic detection. / 指定 git diff 的目标：'staged' 表示暂存区的更改，'all' 表示所有更改，'auto' 表示自动检测。

dish-ai-commit.features.codeAnalysis.aut.description: Automatically detect staged content and prioritize it over all changes when diffTarget is 'auto'. / 当 diffTarget 为 'auto' 时，自动检测暂存区内容并优先使用。

dish-ai-commit.features.codeAnalysis.fal.description: When staged area is empty, fallback to analyze all working directory changes. / 当暂存区为空时，回退到分析所有工作目录更改。

dish-ai-commit.features.codeAnalysis.sim.description: Enable diff content simplification (Warning: Enabling this feature may result in less accurate commit messages) / 启用差异内容简化 (警告：启用此功能可能导致提交信息不够准确)

dish-ai-commit.features.commitFormat.ena.description: Use emoji in commit messages / 在提交信息中使用表情符号
Allow merging changes from multiple files into a single commit message / 允许将多个文件的更改合并为单个提交信息
Include body content in commit messages (if disabled, only the subject line will be generated) / 在提交信息中包含主体内容（如果禁用，将仅生成标题行）
Generate layered commit messages with global summary and per-file details / 生成分层提交信息，包含全局摘要和每个文件的详细描述

dish-ai-commit.features.commitMessage.sy.description: Custom system prompt for commit message generation / 提交信息生成的自定义系统提示语

dish-ai-commit.features.commitMessage.us.description: Use recent commits as a reference for generating commit messages / 使用最近的提交作为生成提交信息的参考

dish-ai-commit.features.weeklyReport.sys.description: Custom system prompt for weekly report generation / 生成周报的自定义系统提示语

dish-ai-commit.features.codeReview.syste.description: Custom system prompt for code review / 代码审查的自定义系统提示语

dish-ai-commit.features.branchName.syste.description: Custom system prompt for branch name generation / 分支名称生成的自定义系统提示语

dish-ai-commit.features.prSummary.baseBr.description: Base branch for comparing commits to generate PR summary / 用于比较提交以生成PR摘要的基础分支

dish-ai-commit.features.prSummary.headBr.description: Head branch for comparing commits to generate PR summary / 用于比较提交以生成PR摘要的头部分支

dish-ai-commit.features.prSummary.system.description: Custom system prompt for PR summary generation / PR摘要生成的自定义系统提示语

dish-ai-commit.features.prSummary.commit.description: The maximum number of commit logs to fetch for SVN when no specific range is provided. / 当未提供特定范围时，为 SVN 获取提交日志的最大数量。

scm/resourceState/context.when: ((config.svn.enabled && scmProvider == svn) || (config.git.enabled && scmProvider == git)) && scmResourceGroup != unversioned && scmResourceGroup != external && scmResourceGroup != conflicts && scmResourceGroup != remotechanges

scripts.compile:webview: cd src/webview-ui && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.quality-gate: npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:check
scripts.package: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce package
scripts.publish: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce publish && npx ovsx publish -p $OVSX_PAT
scripts.publish:pre: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce publish --pre-release && npx ovsx publish --pre-release -p $OVSX_PAT
scripts.vscode:prepublish:esbuild: npm run compile:webview && npm run compile:esbuild
